subject: Officiating (Sports)
Blacks
lead_paragraph: Vince Carter nailed a 3-pointer from well beyond the arc as the buzzer sounded to lift the Nets (16-17) over the surging Hawks on Friday at Izod Center.
snippet: Vince Carter nailed a 3-pointer from well beyond the arc as the buzzer sounded to lift the Nets (16-17) over the surging Hawks on Friday at Izod Center.
